amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for school dropout prevention and reentry programs and provides grants to raise academic achievement levels for all students.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 33 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to provide for school dropout prevention and reentry and provides grants to raise academic achievement levels for all students.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (FL) amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 237 (Roll no. 413).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (FL) amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 237 (Roll no. 413).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Wilson (FL).
